Hi 

I am a complete newbie in JUnit and today is my first day learning 
it. Please bear with me if my question is too dumb. 

I am using Net Beans IDE 4.1. From that, I am trying to build codes 
from http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/testinfected/testing.htm

The problem is that NetBeans does not understand TestCase in 

                 public class MoneyTest extends TestCase {

so I added 

                 import junit.framework.*;

Still, it is giving me error as below:

D:\MyJava\CurrencyTestJunit\src\currencytestjunit\MoneyTest.java:13: 
package junit.framework does not exist
import junit.framework.*;
D:\MyJava\CurrencyTestJunit\src\currencytestjunit\MoneyTest.java:24: 
cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : class TestCase 
location: class currencytestjunit.MoneyTest
public class MoneyTest extends TestCase{


Why can't I import junit from NetBean?
I am also quite new in Java and beginner level. Please help me if you 
know the answer.

Thank you.
